aqi.title: Air Quality Index
aqi.description: Air quality is acceptable for most people. Sensitive groups should consider reducing prolonged outdoor activity.

location.title: Location
location.clickOnMapToSelect: Click on the map to select location...

atmospheric.title: Atmospheric Indices
atmospheric.aerosolDescription: Measurement of atmospheric aerosols correlated with air quality. Higher values indicate greater presence of suspended particles.
atmospheric.uvDescription: Ultraviolet radiation index. Values 0-2: Low, 3-5: Moderate, 6-7: High, 8-10: Very High, 11+: Extreme. Use sun protection when necessary.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.none: No active alerts at this time
alerts.generalAdvice: Outdoor activities are acceptable. Enjoy your usual routine.
alerts.sensitiveAdvice: Consider reducing prolonged or intense outdoor exercise.
alerts.childrenElderlyAdvice: Take breaks during outdoor activities if you experience symptoms.
alerts.critical: Critical alert: Air quality in {{location}} has reached hazardous levels. It is recommended to stay indoors.
alerts.warning: Air quality in {{location}} may affect sensitive groups. Consider reducing outdoor activities.
alerts.moderate: Moderate air quality in {{location}}. Sensitive groups should consider limiting prolonged exposure.
alerts.good: Air quality in {{location}} is good. It's a good time for outdoor activities.
alerts.dataUpdate: NASA TEMPO satellite data has been updated with the latest measurements for {{location}}.
alerts.healthWarning: Sensitive groups (children, elderly, people with respiratory problems) should avoid intense outdoor exercise.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.dailySummaryText: You will receive a daily summary of air quality and forecast. This option is enabled.

map.clickToSelect: Click on the map to select location...

results.title: Results
results.noDataForZone: No TEMPO data available for this zone.
results.outOfRange: This zone is outside TEMPO satellite coverage range. TEMPO mainly covers North America between 20¬∞N-50¬∞N.

errors.geolocationNotSupported: Your browser does not support geolocation

disclaimer.text: Experimental index based on TEMPO satellite data. Does not replace official ground measurements. For educational/demonstration purposes only.
